quote: The skyscrapers of the city had finished scraping all the sky away, and the clouds overhead were exactly the color of concrete and I was safe and cold in a canyon of glass and steel.
quote_letters: THE SKYSCRAPERS OF THE CITY HAD FINISHED SCRAPING ALL THE SKY AWAY AND THE CLOUDS OVERHEAD WERE EXACTLY THE COLOR OF CONCRETE AND I WAS SAFE AND COLD IN A CANYON OF GLASS AND STEEL
